item.title: 中信集团以 4.303 亿美元出售麦当劳中国及香港业务股份
item.description: 中国国有企业中信有限公司已同意以 4.303 亿美元的价格向 Trustar Fast Food Holdings 出售其持有的快餐控股公司（麦当劳中国和香港业务背后的公司）19.23% 的股份。【原文：China's state-owned CITIC Ltd has agreed to sell its 19.23% stake in Fast Food Holdings, the company behind McDonald's China and Hong Kong operations, to Trustar Fast Food Holdings for $430.3 million.】

item.title: 投资者预计从俄罗斯 Yandex 分离出来的人工智能公司将在纳斯达克波动回归
item.description: 总部位于阿姆斯特丹的 Nebius Group 的投资者预计周一的交易将出现波动，因为这家人工智能基础设施公司将在纳斯达克上市。【原文：Investors in Amsterdam-based Nebius Group expect volatile trading on Monday when the AI infrastructure firm's Nasdaq listing, formerly held by Yandex, often dubbed "Russia's Google", is revived following a lengthy suspension.】

item.title: 拉美准备应对美国大选对贸易和关税的影响
item.description: 拉丁美洲正在焦急地数着11月5日的日子，届时美国选民将在副总统卡马拉-哈里斯领导下的相对连续性与前总统唐纳德-特朗普领导下的引发该地区最大市场和经济体动荡的政策之间做出选择。【原文：Latin America is anxiously counting the days to Nov. 5, when U.S. voters will choose between relative continuity under Vice President Kamala Harris or a return to policies that triggered volatility in the region's largest markets and economies under former president Donald Trump.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空购买五架波音 777F，考虑进一步订购货机
item.description: 迪拜阿联酋航空公司周一表示，该公司已经订购了五架波音777F货机，并将在今年内决定为2028/29年以后的机队再购买波音或空客机型。【原文：Dubai's Emirates has ordered five Boeing 777F freighters and will make a decision this year on a purchase of further Boeing or Airbus models for its fleet beyond 2028/29, the airline said on Monday.】

item.title: 礼来就山寨减肥药起诉网络销售商和医疗水疗中心
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly）周一表示，它起诉了三家医疗水疗中心和网络销售商，因为它们销售声称含有其流行的减肥药 Zepbound 的主要成分--替扎帕肽的产品，包括可溶解片剂。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Monday it sued three medical spas and online vendors for selling products claiming to contain tirzepatide, the main ingredient in its popular weight-loss medicine Zepbound, including in the form of dissolvable tablets.】

item.title: KKR 将富士软的招标期延长至 11 月
item.description: 美国投资公司 KKR 在周一提交的一份文件中称，该公司已将其收购日本 IT 服务公司 Fuji Soft 的第一阶段投标延长了 10 个工作日。【原文：U.S. investment firm KKR has extended by 10 working days the first stage of its tender to take Japanese IT services firm Fuji Soft private, it said in a filing on Monday.】

item.title: 西德诺正在洽谈收购西班牙火车制造商 Talgo 的部分或全部股权
item.description: Talgo 公司周一表示，巴斯克钢铁制造商 Sidenor 正在与 Talgo 公司就收购这家西班牙火车制造商的部分或全部股份进行谈判。【原文：Basque steel maker Sidenor is in talks with Talgo about buying some or all of the Spanish train maker's shares, Talgo said on Monday.】

item.title: JAB 以 24 亿美元收购 Mondelez 股份，增持 JDE Peet's 股份
item.description: 德国企业集团 JAB 已同意以每股 25.10 欧元的价格收购 Mondelez 持有的荷兰咖啡制造商 JDE Peet's 的 8600 万股股份，总金额达 22 亿欧元（24 亿美元）。【原文：German conglomerate JAB has agreed to acquire Mondelez's 86 million shares in Dutch coffee maker JDE Peet's for 25.10 euros per share, amounting to a total of 2.2 billion euros ($2.4 billion).】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，大都会人寿正在洽谈以 10 亿至 15 亿美元的价格收购 PineBridge 的前中国资产
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，总部位于纽约的保险公司大都会人寿保险公司（MetLife Inc）正在就收购松桥投资公司（PineBridge Investments）在中国以外的资产进行深入谈判，交易价值可能在 10 亿至 15 亿美元之间。【原文：New York-based insurer MetLife Inc is in advanced talks to buy PineBridge Investments' assets outside of China in a deal that could be valued at $1 billion to $1.5 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 挪威 DNB 银行将以 11.4 亿美元收购卡内基公司
item.description: 挪威最大的银行挪威国家银行（DNB）周一表示，已同意以约120亿瑞典克朗（11.4亿美元）的价格从私募股权公司Altor和少数股东手中收购瑞典投资银行和资产管理公司卡内基（Carnegie）。【原文：Norway's largest bank DNB said on Monday it had agreed to buy Swedish investment bank and asset manager Carnegie from private equity firm Altor and minority shareholders for around 12 billion Swedish crowns ($1.14 billion).】

item.title: 赛诺菲与 CD&R 就出售 Opella 进行独家谈判
item.description: 赛诺菲周一表示，已就向美国私募股权公司Clayton Dubilier & Rice (CD&R)出售其消费者保健业务Opella公司50%的控股权一事进行了排他性谈判。【原文：Sanofi said on Monday it had entered exclusive negotiations for the sale of a 50% controlling stake in its consumer health business Opella to U.S. private equity firm Clayton Dubilier & Rice (CD&R).】

item.title: 瑞银集团向美国运通出售瑞士卡 50%的股份
item.description: 瑞银集团正在出售其去年收购的瑞士信贷的部分业务，该集团将出售瑞士信贷在信用卡提供商 Swisscard 中 50%的股份。【原文：UBS is offloading part of the Credit Suisse business it acquired last year with a deal to sell the fallen bank's 50% stake in credit card provider Swisscard.】

item.title: 战争、经济增长放缓、美国大选为国际货币基金组织和世界银行会议蒙上阴影
item.description: 本周，在中东和欧洲战争、中国经济疲软以及担心美国总统大选可能引发新的贸易战和削弱多边合作等严重不确定性的背景下，全球金融首脑将齐聚华盛顿。【原文：Global finance chiefs will gather in Washington this week amid intense uncertainty over wars in the Middle East and Europe, a flagging Chinese economy and worries that a coin-toss U.S. presidential election could ignite new trade battles and erode multilateral cooperation.】

item.title: 欧洲 SAP 定调
item.description: Vidya Ranganathan 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Vidya Ranganathan】

item.title: 马来西亚称预估数据显示第三季度同比增长 5.3
item.description: 周一，官方预估数据显示，马来西亚第三季度经济可能同比增长5.3%，增速低于前三个月。【原文：Malaysia's economy likely grew 5.3% in the third quarter from a year earlier, slower than the previous three-month period, official advance estimates showed on Monday.】

item.title: 随着 genAI 竞争的白热化，IBM 为企业发布新的人工智能模型
item.description: IBM 周一发布了面向企业的最新版人工智能模型，希望利用企业采用生成式人工智能技术的热潮。【原文：IBM released the latest version of its artificial intelligence models catered towards businesses on Monday, looking to capitalize on the surge in enterprises adopting generative AI technology.】

item.title: 穷国违约潮达到顶峰，现金短缺可能取而代之
item.description: 随着加纳、斯里兰卡和赞比亚等国结束了多年痛苦的债务重组，COVID 后的主权债务违约浪潮终于达到顶峰。【原文：The punishing post-COVID wave of sovereign defaults has finally crested, with the likes of Ghana, Sri Lanka and Zambia concluding years of painful debt reworks.】

item.title: 亚洲股市震荡；比特币因 "特朗普贸易 "而反弹
item.description: 周一，在中国股市疲软的压力下，亚洲股市在积极区域内进进出出，但由于 "特朗普交易 "持续升温，比特币攀上了三个月来的最高点。【原文：Asia shares dipped in and out of positive territory on Monday, under pressure from weakness in Chinese stocks, but bitcoin scaled a three-month peak as "Trump trades" continued to ramp up.】

item.title: 在具有里程碑意义的外包案件中，澳大利亚航空公司被要求向 3 名被解雇的工人支付 11.4 万美元
item.description: 周一，澳大利亚一家法院命令澳航（Qantas Airways）向其在 2020 年非法解雇的三名行李搬运工支付合计 17 万澳元（11.4 万美元）的赔偿金，这意味着涉及约 1700 名工作被外包的前员工的诉讼将面临巨额赔偿。【原文：A court on Monday ordered Australia's Qantas Airways to pay a combined A$170,000 ($114,000) to three baggage handlers it unlawfully sacked in 2020, implying a big damages bill for a lawsuit involving about 1,700 former workers whose jobs were outsourced.】

item.title: 油价每周下跌 7% 后保持稳定
item.description: 由于对世界第一大石油进口国中国需求的担忧，以及对中东潜在供应中断的担忧有所缓解，油价在上周下跌超过 7% 后，周一早盘企稳。【原文：Oil prices steadied in early trading on Monday, following a more than 7% drop last week on worries about demand in China, the world's top oil importer, and an easing of concerns about potential supply disruptions in the Middle East.】

item.title: 中国将基准贷款优惠利率下调 25 个基点
item.description: 继上个月下调其他政策利率作为振兴经济的一揽子刺激措施的一部分之后，中国在周一的月度定盘会上如期下调了基准贷款利率。【原文：China cut benchmark lending rates as anticipated at the monthly fixing on Monday, following reductions to other policy rates last month as part of a package of stimulus measures to revive the economy.】

item.title: 美国银行将保证外汇汇率窗口期延长至一年
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）周一将其保证汇率的有效期延长至一年，这在业内是最长的，目的是在交易量不断增加的情况下降低跨货币交易的风险。【原文：Bank of America on Monday extended its guaranteed exchange rates by up to one year, the longest tenor in the industry, in an effort to reduce the risks to cross-currency transactions amid rising volumes.】

item.title: 消息人士称 Starboard 参股消费品制造商 Kenvue
item.description: 周日，两位知情人士透露，对冲基金 Starboard Value 已入股 Kenvue，该公司是一家生产创可贴、李施德林和泰诺的消费品公司，去年上市。【原文：Hedge fund Starboard Value has taken a stake in Kenvue , the consumer products company that makes Band-Aid, Listerine, and Tylenol, and which went public last year, two people familiar with the matter said on Sunday.】

item.title: 比特币创下 3 个月新高，特朗普当选可能性推动货币发展
item.description: 加密货币比特币在周一的亚洲早盘交易中创下了三个月来的新高，在两周后美国总统大选倒计时的市场中，美元似乎将延续涨势。【原文：Cryptocurrency bitcoin hit a three-month high in early Asia trading on Monday and the dollar looked set to extend its gains in markets counting down to the U.S. presidential election in two weeks.】

item.title: 韩国 10 月 1-20 日出口同比下降 2.9
item.description: 海关机构周一的数据显示，韩国 10 月份前 20 天的出口同比下降了 2.9%。【原文：South Korea's exports for the first 20 days of October fell 2.9% from a year earlier, customs agency data showed on Monday.】

item.title: WiseTech Global 董事会将审查向首席执行官前合伙人支付的款项
item.description: 慧科全球（WiseTech Global）周一表示，该公司正在审查与其首席执行官有关的 "一系列事项"，此前有媒体报道指控其私生活不检点，包括向过去的性伴侣付款，导致其股价暴跌 18%。【原文：WiseTech Global said on Monday it was reviewing a "full range of matters" concerning its CEO after media reports made allegations about his personal life including payments to a past sexual partner, sending its shares slumping 18%.】

item.title: 必和必拓因巴西溃坝事件面临价值 470 亿美元的英国诉讼
item.description: 坍塌引发的毒浪造成 19 人死亡，数千人无家可归，森林被淹，多塞河全线受到污染。【原文：The collapse unleashed a toxic wave that killed 19 people, left thousands homeless, flooded forests, and polluted the length of the Doce River.】

item.title: Rightmove 称，10 月份英国住宅要价几乎没有上涨
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，由于更多房产进入市场，10月份英国房屋的要价仅略有上涨，该调查还表明，一些购房者正在等待新政府即将公布的预算案中明确税收变化。【原文：Asking prices for British homes rose only marginally in October as more properties came onto the market, according a survey on Monday that also suggested some buyers were waiting for clarity on tax changes in the new government's upcoming budget.】

item.title: 研究称，欧盟主要国家斥资 450 亿美元补贴化石燃料公司汽车
item.description: 根据环保组织运输与环境（T&E）委托进行的一项研究，欧盟五大成员国每年花费420亿欧元（约合456.0亿美元）补贴化石燃料公司汽车。【原文：The EU's five biggest members spend 42 billion euros ($45.60 billion) annually subsidizing fossil-fuel company cars, according to a study commissioned by environmental group Transport & Environment (T&E), which called for more subsidies for EVs instead.】

item.title: 日本央行 10 月政策会议看点
item.description: 日本央行将于 10 月 31 日结束为期两天的政策会议，几天后日本将举行大选，新首相石破茂将在大选中面临其支撑薪资和振兴日本疲弱地区经济议程的关键考验。【原文：The Bank of Japan holds a two-day policy meeting concluding on Oct. 31, days after a general election where new Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba faces a key test on his agenda to prop up wages and revitalise the country's weak regional economies.】
